headline: Hasbro’s Lumee Venture And AI Push Meet Strong Share Price Momentum
summary: Hasbro (NasdaqGS:HAS) and Animaj have launched Lumee, a new joint venture focused on digital advertising and brand partnerships in kids’ content. Lumee plans to work with brands such as Peppa Pig and Transformers across major digital platforms. At the North American International Toy Fair, Hasbro highlighted AI driven productivity gains, new franchise collaborations and inclusive toy lines. For investors watching Hasbro at a share price of $102.45, the Lumee launch and Toy Fair...
